mapper.select: select s.id, s.question, s.answer, to_char(s.applydate,'YYYY-MM-DD'), s.appliedcompany, k.keywords from Self_Introduce s left outer join (select s.id, listagg(k.keyword,',') within group(order by sid) as keywords from keyword_selfintroduce k, self_introduce s where k.sid = s.id and s.userid = #{userId} group by s.id) k on s.id = k.id where s.id = #{ id }
mapper.insert: insert into Self_Introduce (id, userId, writeDate) values (#{id}, #{userId}, sysdate)

select keyword_selfintroduce_seq.nextval from dual
insert into keyword_selfintroduce (id, userid, keyword, sid) values(#{id}, #{userId}, #{keyword}, #{sid})
mapper.update: update self_introduce set QUESTION = #{question}, ANSWER = #{answer}, APPLYDATE= to_date(#{applyDate},'YYYY-MM-DD'), APPLIEDCOMPANY = #{appliedCompany}, EDITDATE = sysdate where id=#{id} and userid = #{userId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM KEYWORD_SELFINTRODUCE WHERE sid = #{id} and keyword = #{keyword}
